abstract: Republican opposition groups are not waiting for Hillary Rodham Clinton to announce her all-but-official campaign for president in 2016, as American Crossroads has already cut a ready-for-television ad attacking Ms. Clinton.

headline.main: Republican ‘Super PAC’ Takes Aim at Hillary Clinton

snippet: Republican opposition groups are not waiting for Hillary Rodham Clinton to announce her all-but-official campaign for president in 2016, as American Crossroads has already cut a ready-for-television ad attacking Ms. Clinton.
